sentences.en: A succeeding election it might be supposed, would displace the offenders, and repair the mischief.
sentences.cn: 可以料想接下来的选举, 会取代犯过错的人, 并修补过错.

sentences.en: At present , obviously, nevertheless, he was not likely to displace himself.
sentences.cn: 但时至今日, 很清楚, 他不可能再迁徙了.

sentences.en: Coal has been displaced by natural gas as a major source of energy.
sentences.cn: 作为一种主要能源，煤的地位已为天然气所取代。

sentences.en: Displace the body weight to the opposite side.
sentences.cn: 重心在垂直的一边,左右互换.

sentences.en: How much water I displace by getting into the tub? he asked himself.
sentences.cn: “我浸到大盆里以后,究竟有多少水排了出去? ”他自言自语道.

sentences.en: However, one of the commodities will gradually displace all others, by being more widely acceptable.
sentences.cn: 然而, 最终只会有一种被人们更为广泛地接受的物品,逐渐取代了其他的物品.

sentences.en: immigrants who displace US workers in the job market
sentences.cn: 在就业市场上取代美国工人的移民

sentences.en: Italy; they were displace by Latin.
sentences.cn: 古代意大利的一种绝迹的语言; 被拉丁语取代.

sentences.en: Open the casing valve and producing valve to displace prepad under low pressure.
sentences.cn: 开套管,生产闸门,低压替前垫液.
届时要求重新分配利益的斗争将取代生产上的竞争.

sentences.en: The lace placed in the palace is replaced first and displace later.
sentences.cn: 放在皇宫里的带子先被替换,后被转移.

sentences.en: They seldom displace the purely indicating thermometers for direct.
sentences.cn: 它们很少能代替直读式温度计.

sentences.en: To displace ( a body part ), especially to displace a bone from its normal position.
sentences.cn: 移置 ( 身体的器官 ), 尤指从正常的位置移置骨头.

sentences.en: To displace or move a vein lode, or stratum, for example.
sentences.cn: (地层, 矿脉等)转位,滑动置换或移动(例如水脉、矿脉 、 地层等)

sentences.en: To expose the anterior surface of the prostate, it is necessary to displace the peritoneum superiorly.
sentences.cn: 在暴露前列腺的前面时, 必须向上推开腹膜.

sentences.en: When 20 " casing depth is attained, displace hole volume with high viscosity mud. "
sentences.cn: 钻达20 英寸 套管深度时,用 高粘度 泥浆替满井眼.

sentences.en: Will ethanol displace gasoline feed from our animals?
sentences.cn: 乙醇替代汽油,将从人类、动物口中夺食?

words.tran_cn: 取代，移位；[船] 排水量
取代；置换；转移；把…免职；排水

trans.tran_cn: 替换，取代，迫使（某人）离开家园，移动，使失业
trans.tran_en: to take the place or position of something or someone

trans.tran_cn: 取代， 替代； 迫使…离开家园， 使离开原位
trans.tran_en: to take the place or position of something or someone
